And then you are going to take it to the DMV?
Yes, you should receive a notice from the DMV in the mail.
Okay, that sounds good.
Once you fill out everything, be sure to sign your name at the bottom.
Will do. When can you take the paper to the DMV?
I can take it later on today. If not, I can definitely take it tomorrow.
Awesome. I just want to get everything done fast.
Excuse me, but I'd like to make an appointment for next week.
I can help with that. Did you try doing it over the phone or online?
Yes, but it seemed so confusing.
I know what you mean. They are working on it.
Great. So, I wanted to come in sometime next week.
How does Monday sound?
Monday is no good. Is Wednesday okay?
Yes, Wednesday works. We have these times available.
I can come in at 10 a.m.
Great. I need your name and phone number.
My name is Christopher Clark and my phone number is (555) 323-2465
Great. We will see you on Wednesday.
Hello, I'm here to renew my registration.
Okay, may I please have your renewal notice?
Yes, here it is. Do you need my driver's license?
No, this is fine. It seems you missed your deadline.
Yes, I completely forgot.
Well, it's going to cost you a bit more to renew it.
How much more will it cost?
It was going to be $88, now it's going to be $120.
Well, I guess I'm going to have to be more careful.
It would be a good idea. Have you done the smog check?
No, is that required?
It is this year. You'll have to do it again two years from now.
Can I come back tomorrow?
Yes. Don't wait in line. Come directly to me.
Hello, I wanted to ask you about car insurance prices.
Sure thing. Please, have a seat.
Thank you. I just bought my first car.
Great, congratulations! What kind of car is it?
It's a 1994 Oldsmobile Cutlass Supreme.
Oh, so it's an older make.
Yes, but it's in good condition. So, how much would the payments be?
Depends. Have you been in any accidents?
No, I have not.
Have you gotten any driving tickets?
Nope. That can affect the insurance rate?
At times. Well, everything seems in order. You would have to pay $75 monthly.
That sounds great.
Welcome to Infinity Insurance.
Hello. I am looking to buy insurance for my car.
Well, you have come to the right place. Please, sit.
I came in the other day, and I spoke with David.
Oh, great. Did he take down all your information?
Yes. He told me that I had to bring in this paper from the DMV.
Great. This should go by real quick, then.
David gave me a price yesterday, as well. He told me it would be $75.
Yes, that is what we charge for first time drivers.
Okay, I would like to make my first payment today.
Good. How would you be paying: cash, debit, or credit card?
I will be paying debit.
Hello. I am number G85.
How may I help you today?
I would like to apply for my driving permit.
Are you 16 years old? That's the minimum age.
Yes, I am. Here is my ID.
Thank you. May I see your form?
Oh, of course. Would I be able to take the written today?
If you have the $30, then yes, you can take it.
Oh, I must have forgotten my money at home.
Well, you can make an appointment to take it tomorrow.
That sounds like a good idea.
Okay, I will set up the appointment.
Before you take your written test, we need to take your picture.
Okay, where do I go?
I can take the photo. Stand behind the red line, please.
Where do I go to take the test?
Go on the other side of the wall, and pick a stall.
Sounds good. May I have a pencil?
Sure, the pencils are at the front desk.
Where do I obtain the test?
They will give you your test. Remember, eyes on your own test.
Of course. This reminds me of school.
Yeah, we get that a lot.
Will they let me know if I passed the test or not?
Yes, they will let you know after you finish.
The first thing you want to do is fasten your seat belt.
Check. What's next?
Check your mirrors and make sure you can see behind you.
Done. Should I put it in reverse, now?
Yes, ease off the brake slowly.
Okay, I need to turn to leave the parking lot.
Make sure there are no pedestrians walking behind you.
Okay, do I turn the steering wheel to the left?
Yes, make sure you are paying attention to the cars.
Will do. Do I put it in drive now?
Yes, but remember have your foot on the brake and then ease it off.
Wow, this seems easy. Let's go out on the street.
Where should my hands be on the steering wheel?
Your hands should be on 10 and 2.
10 and 2? What do you mean?
Think of the steering wheel as a clock, and put your hands on 10 and 2.
Oh, okay. What about my eyes? Should I be looking at the signs?
Take a quick glance at the signs, but always look in front.
When do I have to use my horn?
You should use your horn for an emergency.
What about if someone cuts me off?
That's not an appropriate use of your horn.
Am I ready to start driving yet?
No, you need to learn some more of the basics.
Unfortunately, you made a lot of mistakes. I cannot pass you.
What mistakes did I make?
You failed to put your turn signals when turning a corner.
How many mistakes am I allowed?
You are allowed three mistakes. You got five.
Which other mistakes did I make?
You hit the curb when you were parallel parking.
I thought you might have missed that.
No, you also didn't pay attention to some of the signs.
Which signs are you talking about?
You passed a yield sign, and you did not yield.
Can I take the test again?
You can take it again on Monday.
Dad, I passed my driving test!
You did? That's great news!
Where do you want to go first, dad?
You're going to take me out for a ride?
Yes, where do you want to go?
How about we go get you a nice steak dinner?
That sounds great. I could go for a nice steak around now.
Come to the house and pick me up.
Would I be able to drive by myself?
No, you have to drive with someone over the age of 21.
Oh, okay. Well, can we drop off my friend that took me to the DMV?
Sure, we can go drop him off before we leave.
Finally, I got my driver's license.
Congratulations! Can I see it?
Sure. Here it is. I don't like my picture.
Oh, wow. You blinked.
Yeah, they didn't want to take another picture.
I didn't know your middle name was David.
Oh, no. I didn't want anyone to know.
Well, you shouldn't have put it on your license.
I had to. When are you going to get your license?
I was thinking about going tomorrow to the DMV.
You want me to take you? I do have my license now.
Sure! Pick me up from my house at noon.
Excuse me. This is my first time on campus. Where can I park?
There are three parking lots on campus.
Can you point me to the direction of the nearest one?
Keep driving straight. When you get to the light, make a left.
Thank you. Do I have to pay?
The first floor has visitors parking.
So, do I have to pay? Do they take credit cards?
Yes, you would have to pay, and they do take credit cards.
How much does it cost to park?
I believe it is $3. I could be wrong.
Oh, okay. Thank you very much.
You're welcome. Have a nice day.
Sir, is this your car?
Yes, are you giving me a ticket?
Unfortunately, yes, I am. Read the sign.
Which sign? I don't see a sign.
The sign above you, sir.
So, what? It says that we can't park on Mondays.
Yes, it does. Although, it also says that you can't park without a permit.
I didn't see that.
Well, I'm sorry, but I still have to give you the ticket.
Can't you just give me a warning?
I'm sorry, but I already started writing the ticket.
Fine. Give me the ticket. I'll fight it in court.
Dad, I got a parking ticket at school.
Well, you should pay it off as soon as possible.
Where can I pay it off?
You can go to Downtown and go to the court there.
Can I pay it off online?
Yes, you can. Look at the fine. It should give a website.
Oh, okay. Let me go get the ticket. It's in my car.
Hurry, because I need to leave to work.
Oh, wait. I forgot I put it in my wallet.
Well, take it out. Look in the back. It should give you a website.
Yes, it's in the back. Am I going to pay with my debit card?
Yes, do you have the money to pay?

items.title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign

sentences.sentence: Do you know why I stopped you?
No, officer. Why?
You failed to stop at the stop sign.
I'm sorry, officer. I didn't see the stop sign.
Have you had anything to drink?
No, I have not. Do you need to see my license?
Yes, I need your license and registration.
Okay, here is my paperwork.
I will be back. I need to check your background.
Sure thing, officer.
Everything seems to be in order. I'm going to give you a warning.
Thank you, officer. I'll be more careful.
Where do you want to go eat?
I'm not sure. Wait, watch out! The light is red!
Oh, damn. Well, there I passed it.
I think there was a cop at the light.
Can you check? Look behind you.
I don't see anything. Wait, there is a car turning the corner.
Is it a police car? Well, is it?
Oh, no. I think it is.
Well, hopefully he doesn't stop us.
Oh, no. He just turned on his lights.
Damn, I have to pull over.
Yes, I hope I don't get a ticket.
Your Honour, I'd like to challenge this ticket.
What is your reason for challenging this ticket?
The police officer did not have the right to issue the ticket.
Can you explain what you mean with that statement?
I was rightfully parked. He told me that I was parked in a handicap space.
Well, was it a handicap space?
It used to be. It is not anymore.
Well, was there a sign letting you know it was a handicap space?
No, because the spot has since been removed.
So, did you explain to the officer that it was no longer a handicap space.
I tried, but he wouldn't listen. He said I was trying to get away from paying.
Thank you. I will question the officer, and get his side of the story.
I can't pay for the ticket.
Why can't you pay for the ticket?
Well, I just got laid off from my job.
Okay, Mr. Richardson. I'm going to give you an alternative.
What do you mean?
I am going to have to give you 36 hours of community service.
Thank you for the opportunity, Your Honor.
You will report to the nearest community service center.
They will tell me where to go?
Yes, they will give you an option of places to go.
Thank you, Your Honour. I greatly appreciate it.
You're welcome. I hope you don't plan on returning to this courtroom anytime soon.
So, how much is the ticket going to cost?
Well, it's going to be $200.
$200 for a parking ticket?
Well, it looks like this is your third parking ticket.
Yes, but I haven't gotten one in a couple of months.
This is your third parking ticket this year.
I know. Fine, I will pay the ticket.
How will you be paying the ticket?
I will be paying cash.
So that'll be $200 in cash.
Yes. Let me get you your receipt.
Thank you. Have a nice day.
Hello. I need to make an appointment.
Were you mandated by the court to go to traffic school?
Yes, I was. Does that matter?
Yes, it does. Let me have your full name.
It's David Johnson. What days do you have available?
We have Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday.
Oh, okay. I can make it on Thursday. What time should I be in?
Come in at 9 a.m. if you can't make it during that time, please call.
Great. I will see you this Thursday.
Remember to bring your court papers. We will need to sign those.
I seem to have lost them. Could I go to court to get another copy?
Yes, go to the court and print them out before you come over.
Thank you for coming in today. I'll see you next week.
Excuse me, instructor. May I speak with you for a moment?
Sure thing, Mr. Davis. What can I help you with?
Well, about next week. I can't make it.
That is a problem. You are mandated by court to attend every week.
I know, but I have a family emergency.
You have to go to the court and ask for an extension.
Do I have to come back over here after?
No, they will give you a make-up date.
Great. Thank you for all your help.
Sure thing. I hope everything is alright.
Thanks. I'll see you next time.
What's going on? What happened?
I'm sorry. I wasn't paying attention.
Well, I'm going to need your information.
Yes, I know. I'm sorry. I was distracted with the car accident.
I figured. Well, here is my information.
Let me get my information. I have it in my car.
Yes, please do that.
Well, it seems like I don't have my insurance card.
How could you not have your insurance information?
I drive another car; I must have left it in that one.
Fine. Let me get your information.
Sure, call me later on today. I will give you my information.
Hello, officer. I want to report a car accident.
What was the cause of the accident?
The other driver had been drinking.
Are there any casualties?
No, both drivers are fine.
Where did the accident take place?
It's on the corner of Fifth and Vine Street.
How many people are involved in the accident?
There are two cars. Each car has two people in the vehicle.
We will respond as soon as possible.
Thank you. Can you hurry; it looks like one of the drivers wants to leave.
We will get there as soon as possible.
Hello. I was in an accident earlier today.
Okay, did you get the appropriate information from the other driver?
Yes, I did. Just tell me what you need.
It would be better if you came into the office.
When can I come in?
You can come in tomorrow. What time works for you?
I can make it in tomorrow at noon.
Great. Can you give me your full name?
Yes, it's David Mark.
Okay, Mr. Mark. I have you scheduled for tomorrow at noon.
Sounds good. I will see you tomorrow.
Please remember to bring in all the information you got from the other driver.
Police are still searching for a robbery suspect in San Bernardino.
Where did you hear about this?
I saw it on the news last night.
Did he rob a store or a home?
He robbed a check cashing place.
Did he have a weapon?
He had a gun but he tricked a woman working there to let him in the back.
How did he do that?
He pretended to be blind and the woman felt bad for him.
Why would she feel bad for him?
He said he was thirsty so she opened the back to give him a glass of water.
That's why I don't use check cashing places.
Did you see the police posters in the neighborhood?
I haven't seen them. What do they say?
They say not to leave anything valuable in your cars at night.
Sometimes I leave my purse in the car.
Well, the posters say that there has been an increase in car break-ins in our neighborhood.
Do they have any suspects?
The police haven't released any details yet.
I'd better be more careful about what I leave in my car overnight.
Yeah, you should be on the look out for suspicious people.
What makes a person look suspicious?
People looking into cars seems suspicious.
Maybe I'll park my car in the garage from now on.
I need to report a robbery.
Who was robbed?
I was robbed.
I'm so sorry. When did this happen?
It happened 10 minutes ago.
Where were you robbed?
Right outside the bank. I had just taken money from the ATM.
Can you describe the person who robbed you?
He was wearing dark sunglasses and a Yankees baseball cap.
How much money did he take from you?
He took everything I had in my wallet.
You're going to have to fill out a police report.
Can you describe the robbery you saw?
It happened right here in front of the bank.
Can you describe the suspect?
He was tall, wearing sunglasses and a Yankees baseball cap.
Did he have any weapons?
I didn't see a gun, but he had his hand in his pocket.
So he could have had a gun?
I suppose so.
Did you see which way the suspect went?
I was so scared, and was shaking, but I think he went towards the train station.
Could you pick the suspect out of a lineup?
Only if I'm sure that he can't see me.
Someone broke into my house.
How do you know?
The front window is broken and there is glass everywhere.
You shouldn't go in the house until we send an officer there.
I'm already in the house. The house is trashed.
Don't touch anything until the police get there.
My new flatscreen tv is gone.
Is there anything else that is obviously missing?
I can't tell unless I go further into my house.
Please wait outside in case the robber is still inside.
You think he could still be inside?
It's a possibility. A police car will be there shortly.

items.title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up

sentences.sentence: Do you think you can identify the man you saw robbing the woman outside the bank?
I think I remember what he looked like.
Please take a look at the six men lined up.
Can they see me?
No, they cannot see you. This is one-way glass.
I see the man who robbed the lady outside the bank.
Can you tell us which one he is?
It's number three for sure.
Number three, please step forward.
That's him. You're sure he can't see me?
He can't see you. Thanks for your help today.
Please don't let him rob anyone else.
Can you tell us what you saw?
I didn't see much. I was afraid.
Why were you afraid?
The man had his hand in his pocket like he had a gun.
Did you actually see a gun?
No, I didn't.
Did you see the man take the woman's wallet?
I did. I was inside the bank waiting on line.
Could you come to the precinct and fill out a witness statement?
Is it going to take very long?
No, it won't and an officer will drive you home.
I guess I can go to the precinct then.
Can I have you license and registration, sir?
What seems to be the problem, officer?
You have no idea why I pulled you over?
I don't have any idea, officer.
You were going 60 miles an hour and the speed limit is only 45.
Sorry, officer. I guess I was in a rush.
Where are you rushing to?
I'm late picking up my kids from school.
I'm going to have to give you a ticket.
Can't you just let me off with a warning? I'll be more careful next time.
You could have caused an accident and never made it to get your kids.
You have a point, officer.
Open the door, police.
What's going on?
We have a warrant for your arrest.
What's the charge?
You are being arrested for robbery.
I didn't rob anyone.
Tell it to the judge. Turn around, please.
I know my rights!
You have the right to remain silent.
How about my right to a lawyer?
You can call your attorney after we process you.
I'm not saying anything else until I speak to a lawyer.
How do you plea to the charges?
I plead not guilty.
There are several witnesses that can testify to you being the robber.
I understand that, Your Honour. But I did not do it.
There is video surveillance that shows you robbing the victim.
I would like to review that evidence, Your Honour.
Your attorney can provide you with that evidence.
I am sure I can prove my innocence once I see the footage.
Would you like to present any of that evidence now?
May I confer with my attorney?
I can call a half hour recess.
I won't need more time than that, Your Honour.
Given the evidence that has just been provided, the court releases you.
I'm free to go, Your Honour?
You are free to go.
Thank you. I am happy justice has been served.
The court is pleased as well.
I don't ever plan to be back in this courtroom, Your Honour.
I sure hope not.
Your Honour, I didn't commit the crime I was accused of.
Do you know how many times I have heard that?
I'm sure many times, but I mean it.
Many people say they mean it, and I still see them before me.
I won't be one of those people.

items.title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police

sentences.sentence: I want to file a wrongful arrest lawsuit.
What proof do you have that you were wrongfully arrested?
Well, I didn't rob anybody.
Why were you arrested then?
I fit the description of the suspect.
Well, how was that a wrongful arrest?
They didn't investigate if I had a twin brother or not.
Do you have a twin brother?
I have an identical twin brother.
Did the police find out?
The police found out when I told them.
We may have a case then.
I would like to hire you to represent me in court.
What is the court case about?
I'm being accused of robbery.
Did you commit the robbery?
No! It was my twin brother.
Do you have proof of that?
I do have proof of that. I also have an airtight alibi.
When is the next court date?
I have to appear next week.
That doesn't give me much time to prepare.
I can pay whatever you ask.
In that case, let me have my secretary draw up a contract.

items.title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station

sentences.sentence: I'd like to file a complaint.
Of course you want to file a complaint.
Are you the on-duty supervisor?
I am the on-duty supervisor.
Than you can take my complaint.
What is the nature of your complaint?
My neighbor is illegally dumping garbage in my yard.
Would you like us to send some officers to speak to him?
They already did that and he is still throwing nasty garbage in my yard.
All right, you're going to have to see the community police officer upstairs on the third floor.
They will take my complaint?
Yes, they will take it and conduct a full investigation.
Dating is really complicated.
What makes you say that?
You just can't pick somebody up at a bar anymore.
So what do you do now?
There are dating websites, dating apps, even dating clubs.
My friend set me up on a blind date with my now boyfriend.
I need a friend like that.
I'll help you create an online dating profile.
I'm wary about meeting people online.
It's not that different from meeting a stranger on the street.
Dating sure isn't what it used to be.
I think there are more options now. That's a good thing.
what are you doing on Friday night?
I was just going to stay in and watch a movie on Netflix.
How about you let me take you out to a movie?
That would be really nice.
We could even grab a bite to eat afterwards.
I would really like that.
Great! If I pick you up at 6 p.m., would that work?
Yeah, that gives me time to change after work.
Can I have your phone number so I can call when I'm on my way?
That's a great idea. And you should give me your number, too.
Okay, I'm really looking forward to Friday.
We're going to have a really nice time.
I have an extra ticket to the Beyonce concert on Friday.
That's nice.
I was wondering if you want to come with me?
I really like Beyonce, but I'm busy on Friday.
Oh, I understand. Maybe we could go out some other time.
That's so sweet of you, but I don't think so.
Why not?
You're not really my type.
How do you know if you won't give me a chance?
Well, your insistence makes you seem a little desperate.
I'm not desperate. I've just liked you for a long time.
Again, that's sweet, but I'm not interested.
Excuse me. Is your name John?
Yes, and you must be Karen.
I am. I'm sorry this is the first blind date I've been on.
Oh, me too. I'm just as nervous.
Well, that's one thing we have in common already.
You look just like the picture Jimmy showed me.
So how long have you known Jimmy?
We actually used to date.
Wow, your ex set you up on a blind date?
He knows I'm a good catch, so he let me get away.
This is a little awkward.
I know we've been friends since high school.
I kind of always had a crush on you.
Why did you never say so?
You were dating my friend Katy.
You always gave me good advice when I was dating her.
That was so hard to do because I wanted to date you!
I'm glad we were friends first though.
Me too. I feel like we know so much about each other.
We're not starting from scratch.
No, it's a new stage in our friendship.
I think all couples should be friends first.
Are you telling me it's not weird dating Katy after being friends with her for so long?
It's a little strange since I've known her for so long.
You also know everyone she dated.
I've given her advice on guys she's dated.
Didn't she date your best friend once?
Yeah, but he stopped being my best friend after I started dating Katy.
Why is that?
He thought I had always been after her.
Had you always been after her?
Honestly no. I really only liked her as a friend.
When did that change?
When I came back from finishing college.
Hi John, this is Katy.
It's so nice to hear your voice.
I just wanted to call you and thank you for the lovely time last Friday.
I'm glad you liked the movie.
The restaurant you picked was great, too.
I wasn't sure you'd be into Greek food.
I'm hoping we can do it again soon.
I really would like that.
I have tickets to a play on Saturday.
I really like the theater.
Then you'll come with me?
It sounds like we have a second date.
Hi Katy, this is John.
Oh, hey. How are you?
I'm great. I wanted to thank you for going out with me last Friday.
I'm glad you had a good time.
You didn't seem to enjoy it that much.
To be honest, I didn't like the movie you picked.
I thought a horror movie would be a great way for us to get close to each other.
You were a little too hands on.
Why don't we try again next weekend?
I really don't think so.
Are you interested in going out with me again at all?
You should probably lose my number.
Were you invited to Leslie's birthday party dinner?
I was. I'm really excited about it.
Would you like to go with me?
Do you mean as your date?
Yeah, why not? You and I have been out a few times together.
This will be the first time we go out in front of friends though.
Are you embarrassed to be seen with me?
Not at all. It will be really nice though.
I'll pick you up at 8:00 then?
Why not 7:30?
Why so early?
It will give us time to pick up a bottle of wine on our way.
Were you invited to Barb's birthday party?
I was. It should be really fun.
Do you have a date for the party?
As a matter of fact I don't have.
Do you want to have a date for the party?
Do you know someone?
I was thinking maybe you'd want to go as my date.
Oh. I don't think that's a good idea.
Why not? You said yourself it would be fun.
The party would be fun. Going with you would not be.
Wow, that's kind of harsh.
At least I'm honest.
I thought you were going to cook dinner today.
I've been working all day.
Yeah, but you work from home. That doesn't count.
It sure seems to count when I help pay the bills.
You know I pay more bills than you do.
That's because you make more money than I do.
This is why you should make dinner.
You are so sexist.
Way to get off topic. This is about you not making dinner.
We can make dinner together or order in.
What's the point of you working from home but won't take care of the home.
You know what? I'm going out to eat by myself.
Did you water the plants?
I did this morning.
It doesn't look like you did.
Well, I did. Are you calling me a liar?
No. It's just I know sometimes you can be a little lazy.
Is this how you normally speak to people you are in a relationship with?
This is how I speak to people who are not doing what they are supposed to do.
Wow! I am really hurt by how you are talking to me.
Maybe you are feeling guilty.
No. I'm feeling like I made a mistake.
What do you mean?
I'm going to go for a walk before I say something I'm going to regret.
We need to talk.
Uh oh! It sounds like you are going to break up with me or are pregnant.
Funny you should mention that.
Wait! You are pregnant?
No dummy. I think we need to take a break.
A break from what?
A break from seeing each other.
So, are you breaking up with me?
Yeah, I'm sorry. This just isn't working out.
Are you going to give me the "it's not you"?
No, because it actually is you.
At least you're honest.
I don't understand how health insurance works in the U.S.
Do you have health insurance through your job?
I'm a part-time employee, so that is not part of my benefits package.
You can buy health insurance based on your income.
How exactly does that work?
If you go to healthcare.gov, you can see what plans you are eligible for.
Then what happens?
You pay a fee every month and choose a primary care doctor from your plan.
What is a primary care doctor?
A primary care doctor is the doctor you visit when you have a headache or for regular check-ups.
Do I go to my primary care doctor in an emergency?
No, in an emergency, you just go to the closest emergency room.
This is 911. What is your emergency?
I think my wife just had a stroke or a heart attack.
Can you describe her symptoms?
She is unconscious but breathing. She won't wake up.
We are sending an ambulance right now.
How do you know my address?
We can track it down through our phone system.
How long will it take for the ambulance to get here?
It should be there in less than five minutes, sir.
I think I hear the ambulance coming now.
Please let the paramedics in so they can take your wife to the nearest hospital.
Thank you. I'll open the door.
I cut myself pretty badly with a knife. I think I need stitches.
Come inside so the triage nurse can stop the bleeding.
I was just preparing dinner and my hand slipped.
This cut does need stitches, but I stopped the bleeding for now.
Will you give me stitches right now?
No, since the bleeding has stopped you have to wait in the Emergency Room waiting area.
What do I do while waiting?
Fill out these registration forms.
When will I get my hand stitched up?
Here in the ER we take care of people based on how bad their injury is.
I was here before many of these other people.
Some of them are in worse shape than you.
I woke up with the worse stomachache.
Did you try going to the bathroom?
I went to the bathroom, but that didn't make the pain go away.
Did you eat anything strange last night? Maybe you have food poisoning.
No. Because then I would be vomiting.
Where exactly is the pain?
It hurts here on my right side.
That's where it hurt when I had to get my appendix taken out.
It's probably just gas.
Did you take any medication?
I took an antacid an hour ago.
It should have worked by now. This could be serious.
Why are you holding your mouth?
I think I cracked a tooth. It hurts so much.
Did you look in the mirror?
No, but I can feel a sharp pain when my tongue touches my molars.
That sort of thing can be infected easily.
So what should I do?
You should find an emergency dentist.
That is going to cost so much money.
Yeah, but it's better than being in pain.
Do you think they'll have to pull the tooth?
Maybe they just have to seal it up.
Get me the yellow pages so I can find a nearby emergency dentist.
I have a really bad headache. What do you recommend?
You can purchase some over-the-counter pain relievers in aisle 6.
Do I need a prescription for those?
No. You just pick whichever brand your prefer and pay for it at the register.
There are so many choices.
If you read the labels, you can pick the one that is best for you.
Is there a difference between the name brand pills and the store brand pills?
Usually there isn't. Just compare the labels and look for active ingredients.
The store brand is less expensive.
Usually it is just as effective.
I sure hope so because I want to save money and not have a headache.
I think you can achieve both things.
My doctor gave me this prescription.
Can I have the paper and your insurance card?
How long will this take to be filled?
We can have this filled within an hour.
Is there any way to fill it faster? I'm in so much pain.
Unfortunately there are other prescriptions to fill.
What am I supposed to do for the hour?
We can call you when the prescription is ready.
So I can go home and take a nap.
Just leave your number here at the pharmacy and we'll call you.
Can I send someone else to pick up the prescription?
Your medication is a controlled substance so the person needs to be over 18.
I'm calling to see if the results of some tests I took are in?
I can check for you. Can I have your name, please?
Sure, my name is Willie Foster.
Mr. Foster, your doctor is Dr. Edwards?
Yes, that's right.
Can you tell me when the tests were taken?
I was there last week.
I see your results are in, Mr. Foster.
Great! Can you read them to me?
Actually I cannot. You need to come in and see the doctor.
Are they that bad? Am I dying?
Sir, I'm just the receptionist. Why don't you come and speak to Dr. Edwards?
Hello, this is Isabel Foster.
Hi, Isabel. Why are you calling? You can just come to my office.
I'm actually not in the office right now.
You aren't? Well, why not? Is everything okay?
Actually everything is not okay. I'm pretty sick.
I'm sorry to hear that.
I'm not going to make it into the office today.
There's no way you can come in, just finish that report?
If I come in, I may give everyone what I have.
Well, what do you have?
I have a really bad stomach flu.
Eww yeah, in that case, stay home.
What brings you into my examination room today?
I'm here because your receptionist told me I needed to come in to discuss my test results.
Well, let me take a look at your file.
The receptionist made me nervous when she wouldn't tell me the results over the phone.
Legally she can't tell you the results.
So is it bad, doctor?
Your cholesterol is a little high.
Does that mean I'm going to die.
Let's not exaggerate.
I'm going to be okay?
If you change your diet and exercise more, you will be fine.
I will do whatever it takes to be healthy.
I'm calling because I need to reschedule my appointment.
What was the original appointment date and time?
I am supposed to come in on Thursday at 10 in the morning.
Are you Tina Williams?
That's me.
When would you like to reschedule the appointment for?
Can Dr. Harris see me next Tuesday at 10?
He doesn't have an opening that day until noon.
I'll have to come on my lunch break then.
So shall I give you that appointment time?
Yeah, put me down for that time.
Just let us know 24 hours in advance if you need to cancel or reschedule.

items.title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill

sentences.sentence: Can I have a minute?
What is going on?
I'm really not feeling very well this afternoon.
Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that.
Do you think I can leave the office early?
Well, I have some medication here on my desk.
I already took some pills and they really aren't helping.
It's just that we have the report due today.
I already gave Dennis what I have so far.
He knows how to finish it?
I emailed him detailed instructions.
All right, go home then, but leave your phone on so we can call you if we have questions.

items.title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab

sentences.sentence: I'm here to have some blood tests done.
We take all the samples in the back room, so please follow me.
I usually have blood taken at the doctor's office.
More and more doctors are outsourcing that to private labs now.
It's kind of pain because I have to make another appointment to go somewhere else.
I understand, but we are professionals.
So you won't mind if I scream when you take blood?
Are you a screamer?
Sometimes I even faint.
I have a very gentle touch.
I'm going to close my eyes.
Well, first you need to fill out these forms.
I'm so sick of being sick.
Have you been taking any medicine?
I have taken every over-the-counter medicine in the pharmacy.
Maybe you need a prescription for an antibiotic.
I went to the doctor, and he says it's viral so no antibiotic will help.
Have you tried any home remedies?
What do you suggest?
You can try sitting in the bathroom with the shower running so it's all steamy.
What will that do?
It will help with the congestion.
Yeah, but I can't sit in the bathroom all day.
Do it in the morning and before you go to bed.
I need to make an appointment to see Dr. Taylor.
Are you already a patient of Dr. Taylor?
No, this is the first time I've been seeing him.
What kind of appointment is this?
It's for my annual physical.
Can you tell me what insurance you have?
I have Blue Cross.
The earliest appointment I can give you is Wednesday, September 3 at 10 in the morning.
That works for me.
Please bring in your health insurance cards when you come in on that day.
Will you send me a reminder in the mail?
If you give us your phone number, we will remind you the day before.
Your blood pressure is very high.
What does high blood pressure mean?
High blood pressure or hypertension means that there is a lot of pressure on your arteries.
That doesn't sound very good.
It isn't very good because it means you are at higher risk to develop heart disease.
I feel fine, though.
High blood pressure is called a silent killer.
What causes high blood pressure?
It could be the sign of some other diseases.
I am already taking medication.
You should tell me the medications you are taking because some meds cause high blood pressure.
I'd better change my lifestyle.
Wow, you really look terrible.
Thanks a lot. I really feel awful.
I'm a nurse ,so you should tell me your symptoms.
Well, to begin with, my whole body aches.
Have you taken your temperature to see if you have a fever?
I have, and I'm running a slight fever.
Sounds like you may have the flu.
That's impossible because I got my flu shot.
You can still get the flu even if you get vaccinated.
Well, that makes getting the vaccine pointless.
Not really, because you will probably get over it quickly.
I'm going to make some tea and lie down.
What brings you in to see me today?
I'm here for my annual check-up.
Well, the nurse already took your blood pressure and she said it looks a little high.
That could be related to my thyroid medication.
That could be it. Let me listen to your heartbeat.
Does it sound good, doctor?
Sounds nice and strong to me.
I am concerned about some pain I've been having in my knee.
Are you very physically active?
I'm training to run the marathon.
That puts a lot of pressure on your knees.
I hope I don't have to stop training.

items.title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency

sentences.sentence: Help! I need the doctor immediately.
What is the problem, sir?
I think my wife had a stroke.
What symptoms does she have?
Look at her! She is awake, but in a catatonic state.
How long has she been like this?
She's been like this since this morning.
She should be taken to the hospital.
But this is the doctor's office. You can't help her?
She needs to see an emergency specialist.
What can you do for her?
We are going to have her transferred to the nearest hospital.
We think your leg may be broken.
How will you know for sure?
We're going to take you to Radiology to get it x-rayed now.
Will the x-ray hurt?
It's a pain free procedure that allows us to take a picture of your bones.
Are there any side effects associated with taking an x-ray?
Diagnostic x-rays are safe as long as they are not overused.
I've never had an x-ray in my entire life.
Then you should be fine.
Can someone be in the room with me?
Someone can be in the room with you, but not next to you during the x-ray.
Please go get my wife then.
I'm so glad you could squeeze me into your schedule today, doctor.
Sure, what seems to be the problem?
I was in a small car accident last month, but only recently noticed some neck pain.
Is there any bruising?
Not that I can see.
Show me where the pain is.
The pain feels like a sharp stabbing followed by a dull throbbing.
I don't see bruising, but there could be nerve damage.
So what do I do next?
I'm going to refer you to a nerve specialist.
Do you think I can sue?
Is that what this is all about?
Doctor, I have a few questions I would like to ask.
I'd be happy to answer your questions.
Based on my test results, do you think I should be taking a multi-vitamin?
Your levels are all within the normal range, so just eat vitamin rich food.
I am trying to get pregnant.
Then you should take a pre-natal vitamin.
Those are expensive.
An alternative would be to eat food enriched with Folic Acid.
What foods are enriched with Folic Acid?
Some cereals and breads now are enriched with Folic Acid.
What if I'm staying away from grains?
Then you should take a vitamin with Folic Acid.
In order to check for an infection, we are going to need a urine sample.
How does that work?
Take this little cup, and pee in it.
Do I have to fill the whole cup?
If you fill it half way, it will be fine.
What do I do with the cup?
Put it in the plastic bag and leave it on the tray in the bathroom.
No one else will take my sample?
The nurse will take it when you leave the bathroom.
I'm glad I drank some water while I was in the waiting room.
We would have given you water and waited until you need to use the bathroom.
You don't need to wait because I'm ready to use the bathroom now.
Do you have any tips on how to stay healthy?
How do you think I got to look this good at my age?
Let me guess, you drink a lot of water?
I drink at least eight glasses a day.
I bet you exercise every day, too.
I try, at the very least, to walk 20 minutes a day.
I didn't think walking was good exercise.
Walking briskly is great exercise.
What about eating habits?
Try to eat as much non-processed stuff as possible.
What do you mean non-processed?
If it's in a can, a bag, or a box it's probably processed.
I saw a commercial about a heart medication.
You don't have any heart problems.
I know, but the ad suggested I ask my doctor if that medication was right for me.
As your doctor, I can tell you that you don't need any heart medication.
Okay, what about this medication that has the commercial with the couple in the bathtub?
What about it?
Can you prescribe that to me?
The only thing I am prescribing you is an antibiotic for your strep throat.
What do I do with this piece of paper?
Take it to the pharmacy, and the pharmacist will give you the antibiotic.
What if it doesn't work?
Come back to see me again.
I'd like to make a reservation.
Can you tell me what dates you would like to stay?
I want to stay from April first through the third.
That's two nights. What kind of room would you like?
I'd like an economy room, please.
Do you want two twin beds or one queen bed?
I'll be staying in the room alone, so one queen bed is fine.
That will be a total of $219. I need your credit card number.
I have to pay right now?
We need a credit card so we can hold your reservation.
What if I need to cancel?
You need to let us know 24 hours in advance, or else we charge you regardless.
I'm going to book our hotel reservation online.
Are you going to book directly from the hotel website?
I think if I use a service like Hotels.com, it is cheaper.
You should compare the websites and see which gives us a better deal.
It asks us how many nights we are staying.
You are also going to have to tell them how many adults and children are staying in the room.
The hotels.com website compares prices for different hotels.
Pick the one that is cheapest, but has the nicest rooms.
How can I tell?
Look at the pictures and also read the reviews.
How do I pay once I pick a hotel?
Here, take my credit card.
I'm checking in.
What name is the reservation under?
It is under my name, Michael Roberts.
Can I see your identification, please?
Here is my driver's license.
I have you staying for two nights. Is that correct?
That's correct.
I need a credit card for any incidentals.
I don't plan on using the phone or the mini-bar.
I still need a credit card though.
Can I pay cash?
You will have to pay a $200 cash deposit if you don't want to leave a credit card.
I have an early meeting, so can I get a wake-up call?
Sure! What time should we call you?
Can you call my room at six in the morning?
Just tell me your room number.
I'm staying in room 302.
Okay, Mr. Roberts. We'll call you at 6 a.m.
What happens if I don't answer?
Then you'll probably miss your meeting.
Can I request a second wake-up call?
What time should we schedule the second wake-up call?
Call me again at 6:15 a.m. if I don't answer at six.
So we have one wake-up call at six and a second one fifteen minutes later..

items.title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice

sentences.sentence: I have a few hours to explore the city.
I can make some recommendations for you.
Great! I want to see some museums.
Here are some brochures for some local museums. Do you like modern or classic art?
I like modern art. Are the museums far?
It depends on which one of the two modern art museums you want to see.
Where is the closest one?
Let me show you on the map. This one is in walking distance from the hotel.
Is the ticket to get in very expensive?
It's normally $20.
Does the hotel offer any discount tickets?
If you buy the ticket here, it will only cost you $15.

items.title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice

sentences.sentence: Are there any good French restaurants around here?
There are quite a few. I have some menus you can look at.
Which one do you recommend? It's my wife's birthday.
The French Quarter is very romantic.
Is it very expensive?
It is about $50 a person, not including alcohol or tip.
Do I need a reservation?
Yes, but I would be happy to make that reservation for you.
Great! Get us a table for two at 8.
Will you also need transportation to the restaurant?
Can you get a limo to pick us up?
I can do that for $30.
I'd like to order room service, please.
What would you like to order?
I'm really hungry. What are my choices?
There should be a menu in your room.
I have it in front of me. Can I have a cheeseburger deluxe with bacon and fries?
Sure. How do you want your burger?
Bloody, and I want my bacon extra crispy.
Would you like anything to drink?
Can I have a beer?
Are you 21 or older?
I'm way older than 21.
We'll send that to your room in 30 minutes. You can pay upon delivery or we can charge your room.

items.title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)

sentences.sentence: Hi, I'm calling from room 117, and there is a big problem.
I'm so sorry. What seems to be the issue?
The issue is a huge disgusting cockroach in my bathroom.
Is it just one cockroach?
Yeah, there is only one, but it's the size of my hand!
Why don't you just kill it?
I shouldn't have to kill cockroaches while I'm on vacation.
Do you want me to send someone to kill it for you?
You can send someone, but I also want to be moved to a different room.
I don't know if we have any other rooms available right now.
Well, I'm not staying in this room if there are gigantic roaches sharing it with me.
I'll send someone to your room right away to see if we can move you.

items.title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)

sentences.sentence: There're a few problems with room 217, and I'd liked to be moved.
Maybe it's a problem we can fix without moving you.
If you can kill the 8 cockroaches I've seen this morning.
Did you say 8 cockroaches? Are you exaggerating just a little?
I know how to count and I took pictures and video with my cell phone.
We can call an exterminator and send him to your room.
Great, and then I'm supposed to breathe in toxins after that?
At least you won't have any more roaches.
You can't be serious right now. Can I speak to your supervisor?
I can transfer your call right now.
Can you also transfer my room?
I'll check to see if we have any vacant rooms we can move you to.
Is there a gym in this hotel?
Yes, the fitness center is located on the third floor.
Is there a charge for me to use it?
No, it's free to all of our guests.
Wonderful! Can I go use it right now?
Unfortunately, the gym is only open from 5 a.m. to 7 p.m. and it's 10 p.m. now.
I guess I'll use it in the morning then.
Just use your room key card to get in.
Are there weight machines?
The gym has weight machines, some treadmills, and some elliptical machines, too.
What about a personal trainer?
No, there are no personal trainers, just the machines.
There are some amenities missing from my hotel room.
I'm so sorry to hear that. What is your room number and what's missing?
I'm in room 143; there is no hairdryer.
I can send one up to you right away.
Great! So that I can use that hairdryer, can you also send up shampoo and conditioner?
There should have been a basket in the bathroom with all that.
Well, there isn't.
Anything else I can send up to your room?
Yes, I need an iron and an ironing board.
Those aren't in your closet?
Maybe they are invisible. I don't see them.
I do apologize. I'll bring them personally.

items.title: Asking Where to Make a Copy

sentences.sentence: Is there a copy machine for guests?
Yes, we have copy machines in our business center, which is to your right.
I need to make a color copy.
There are two black and white machines and one color copier.
Is there a charge to use the machine?
The cost per sheet on the color copy machine is 25 cents.
Does the machine take credit cards?
No, but I'd be happy to give you change if you have bills.
I need to make four color copies, so give me change for a dollar.
The machine also takes one dollar bills, so you don't need change.
Is there usually a wait for the machines.
Our business center is pretty empty right now, so you should have the run of the place.

items.title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency

sentences.sentence: Is there a doctor on call?
What seems to be the problem?
My husband is having chest pain. I think it's a heart attack.
We are calling for an ambulance right now.
I don't need an ambulance, I need a doctor.
We don't have a doctor on duty at the hotel.
I think he is going to die!
The paramedics are on their way.
Is there no one on staff to help us?
Calm down, someone is coming up right now.
Someone is knocking on the door.
Take a deep breath; it may be the paramedics.
I'm having trouble connecting to the wireless network.
What network are you trying to connect to?
I'm trying to connect to the Bay Hotel Network.
You need to connect to Bay Hotel Guest Network.
What login do I use?
Your room number is your login.
What about the password?
The password for all guests is "vacationconnect", all one word, all lower case.
That seems to work. Thanks so much.
No problem. In the future, refer to the guest folder located by the television.
I'm so stupid. I didn't even think to look there.
No problem. That's what we're here for.

items.title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar

sentences.sentence: I need someone to come up and restock the minibar in my room.
Does everything need to be restocked?
The good stuff needs to be restocked.
Tell me what's good to you, sir.
The three mini bottles of Grey Goose were great.
Do you need the mixers to be restocked, too?
I just need more cranberry juice to go with the vodka.
Do any of the snacks need to be restocked?
Bring a can of the honey roasted nuts.
You like nuts, sir?
I'm nuts about nuts.
Okay, just give me your room number and someone will restock those items.
Can you tell me where the pool is?
It's right outside the automatic sliding doors to your left.
Is it open 24 hours?
No. The pool is open from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m.
Where can I get towels for the pool?
There are wicker baskets by the pool with fresh towels.
Is the pool heated?
We keep the pool heated to 80 degrees.
How deep is the pool?
The pool is 3 feet on one end and goes up to 12 feet at the other end.
How often do they clean the pool?
It's cleaned every day before it opens.

items.title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk

sentences.sentence: I need a cab to the theater district.
We can get that for you right away.
Well, I don't need to be there for another hour.
Would you like to reserve a limo then?
That seems a bit much for me. Just a regular cab is fine.
We can't reserve a taxi that far in advance, sir.
So how do I get a cab in an hour then?
If you go right outside our lobby when you are ready, a staff member will hail one for you.
Do I have to tip the guy who gets the cab for me?
Tips aren't mandatory, but they are appreciated.
Maybe I'll just hail the cab myself then.
That's also an option.
I'm ready to check out.
Give me your room key, and tell me your room number, please?
Here's the key. I was in room 250.
Let me print out a copy of all your charges for your review.
This looks right.
Excellent! Will you be paying with the credit card you used when you checked in?
Yeah, just charge the total to that.
I just need your signature and you're all set.
Thanks so much. I had a wonderful stay.
I hope you will stay with us again in the future.
I stay here all the time when I'm in town on business.
In that case, we'll see you soon.
There are some charges on the final bill that are incorrect.
Okay, sir. Can you tell me which ones are in dispute?
I never ordered this movie "The Care Bears Christmas."
Are you sure your kids didn't order it?
I don't have any kids. Besides I was at the theater at that time.
All right, I'll take that charge off your bill. Anything else?
Yeah, I didn't drink 4 bottles of Grey Goose from the minibar.
I remember you calling for more vodka, sir.
Yeah I ordered three more bottles, but I didn't drink any of them.
Maybe you don't remember drinking the additional three bottles?
What are you trying to say, that I'm an alcoholic?
No, sir. I'm just reading what is in our system.

items.title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours

sentences.sentence: I'm checking out, but is there a place I can store my luggage for a few hours?
Why do you need us to hold your luggage, sir?
My flight doesn't leave for another four hours.
We can hold your luggage, but there is an additional cost associated with that service.
How much is it going to cost me?
It will be $6 an hour.
I'm going to drink at your hotel bar. Can you hook me up?
Unfortunately, sir, we cannot. Shall I take your credit card?
No, forget it. It's cheaper for me to use a locker at the airport.
Those airport lockers are not always safe though.
I'll take my chances.
Good luck with that, sir.

items.title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up

sentences.sentence: Can I leave a package here to be picked up?
Absolutely, sir. What is your name?
I'm Bill Collins. My room is 108.
Who will be picking up the package?
It's my girlfriend, Katie Black.
She will have to present identification when she picks it up.
That's fine. I'll let her know.
What time will she be picking the package up?
She'll be here after 2 p.m. Is that all right?
Not a problem at all. Could you just write all the info down?
Why did I bother telling you everything then?
Writing it down will make sure that if I'm not here someone will know what to do.
I need to cancel a reservation.
Can you tell me the name the reservation is under?
Sure! The reservation is under the name Carlos Jones.
Can you please confirm your billing address?
It's 116 Lighthouse Road in Boston.
Did you want to reschedule the reservation?
No, I need to cancel it outright.
So I'm canceling the reservation from March 3 through 5th, correct?
That is right.
The cancelation will be subject to a $15 cancellation fee.
No one told me that when I made the reservation.
I'm sorry, sir. You can pay the cancellation fee or be charged for the full stay.
What are you going to do this weekend?
I haven't made any solid plans yet. Why do you ask?
There's this event at a bookstore downtown I was thinking of checking out.
That sounds really interesting.
Yeah, and even if it's not, we can leave and grab a bite.
There are so many nice new places that have opened up downtown.
I know, and have wanted to try them all.
So our meeting time is Saturday at three.
I'll meet you at the bookstore.
It's the bookstore on Spring Street.
We can grab some food and drinks after.
An early dinner sounds great.
Did you get invited to Wanda's party this Sunday?
I did. I even went shopping for a new outfit.
Did you also go shopping for a gift to bring?
We're supposed to bring gifts?
Of course! You can't just show up at someone's house empty handed.
I don't even know what Wanda likes.
You can buy something that everyone at the party will like.
It's not everyone's party, it's Wanda's party.
I mean you can bring a fruit salad or some wine.
Not everyone drinks wine though.
I'm just giving you suggestions.
I guess I'd better go back to the mall.

items.title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party

sentences.sentence: You know my birthday is coming up in three weeks.
So you are getting older.
Indeed I am, and that's why I'm celebrating with a party.
I love parties! When is it going to be?
The party is going to be the Saturday before my birthday.
Where is the party going to be held?
It's going to be at the arcade on Main Street. Will you come?
Of course I will be there.
Here's an invitation with all of the details.
What time does the party start?
It starts at 1 p.m.
I will be there!

items.title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party

sentences.sentence: I really want to thank you again for approving that raise.
No problem, Val. You deserve it because of all your hard work.
Regardless, I would like to show my appreciation by inviting you to dinner.
How thoughtful of you, Val.
My husband and I would like to throw a dinner party in your honor.
That would be lovely.
Can you join us this Thursday evening?
Thursday evening works for me.
Please bring your wife.
She'll have to check her schedule, but it should work out.
I'm also inviting the head of the finance department and his wife.
They are a lovely couple.

items.title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party

sentences.sentence: I'm calling because I got the invitation to your party in the mail.
I was worried that maybe it got lost.
No, it came in the mail yesterday.
So, will you be coming to the party?
You bet I'll be there.
Great! please feel free to bring your family.
I was actually looking forward to some time away from them.
Regardless if you come with them or solo, please don't bring any gifts.
Why is that?
My husband is having the whole thing catered.
I can at least bring a bottle of wine.
That would be nice.

items.title: Decline an Invitation to a Party

sentences.sentence: Did you get the invitation to my party?
The invitation came in the mail yesterday.
I was worried it got lost in the mail.
Unfortunately, I can't go to your party. I wish I could.
I'm sorry to hear that.
My mother-in-law is visiting that day.
I'm really sorry that you can't come.
If I could sneak out of the house, I would, but my wife would kill me.
I wouldn't want that on my hands.
The next party you have, I promise I will be there.
What if your mother-in-law visits again?
Thankfully, she only comes once a year.
I'd like to buy some flowers for my best friend's birthday.
What is your friend's favorite color?
She loves the color pink.
I can make her a bouquet with pink roses.
I don't want roses because that seems romantic, not to mention expensive.
I can make the bouquet with carnations, lilies, and daisies instead.
That sounds friendlier and cheaper.
Would you like these to be delivered to your friend?
That would be a great surprise.
Just fill out this card and include the delivery address.
Can you deliver these today?
I can have them to your friend before 5 p.m.
I'm so bad at picking out gifts for my husband.
The eternal question of what to get for the man who has everything.
What do you suggest?
Well, is your husband into sports?
He is a huge fan of both soccer and American football.
Well, the football season is about to start. How about a jersey from his favorite team?
That's actually a great idea.
Just tell me what size he is.
He's really tall but slim.
How about a large then?
If it doesn't fit, can I return it?
I'll include a gift receipt so he can return it, too.
Thank you for coming to my party this evening.
No, thank you for letting me come as my cousin's guest.
Any relative of Tina is welcome in my home. Have a seat.
Thank you. You two know each other for a long time?
We have. Can I get you something to drink?
A glass of water will be fine.
Would you like that with or without ice?
Without ice is fine.
We also have a buffet out back.
Could you show me the way?
Sure just follow me. I think your cousin is out back.
You really have a lovely home.
It's been so long since I've seen you!
I know. You haven't changed a bit.
Oh, stop lying. I've gained a little weight.
We all have gained some weight.
Tell me how the kids are doing.
They are doing well, and yours?
They are doing so well, growing up so fast.
Are you at the same job or are you doing something else?
No. I left that place three years ago to start my own business.
Congratulations! You always had an independent spirit.
Thanks. It's going really well so far.
I'd love to hear more about it over a cup of coffee.
Can I get you something to drink?
I would love something to drink.
I have water, juice, ice tea or did you want something stronger?
Something stronger would be great. Do you have wine?
I do. Would you prefer red wine or white wine?
I'd love white, but it depends what kind you have.
I have Chardonnay.
That would be great. I'll take a glass.
Excellent! Should I also bring out some cheese and crackers.
That would go so well with the wine.
Great! Just give me a moment to get that from the kitchen.
You are such a wonderful host.
Can I get you something to drink?
No, thanks. I just finished a whole bottle of water.
You won't mind if I have something then?
Of course not.
Can I offer you some fruit or cheese?
I just had lunch before I came here.
I really hope you don't mind if I eat because I haven't had lunch.
Go right ahead and do what you normally do.
I didn't eat because I assumed you would be joining me.
I hope you're not offended.
No, I'm not offended at all.
Oh, good. I ate before because I didn't want to impose.
Did you hear what happened to Marie?
I have no idea what happened. Is she okay?
She's devastated. Marie and her fiancÃ© called the wedding off.
She was so excited about the wedding. How did you find out?
I saw Marie posting on Facebook; she was sad about losing her love.
What do you think happen?
I think Marie's fiancÃ© is still in love with his ex.
What makes you say that?
Have you seen his Facebook page?
No. What does it say?
He has pictures of him and his so-called ex.
Wow, I feel so bad for Marie.
I always get so emotional at weddings.
Me too, especially when I see the bride and groom kiss.
The bride looked so beautiful.
She did, and the groom looked so dapper in his tux.
I'll see you at the reception in a little bit.
No, you won't, because I wasn't invited.
Oh, I'm so sorry. Maybe your invite was lost in the mail.
It's okay. Why don't you bring me as your plus one?
Actually no, because I'm going with my husband.
Please take pictures so I can see how nice everyone looked.
I'm sure there will be pictures online afterwards.
It's not the same as being there.
What a great day to be at the beach.
I love the smell of the salt-water air.
Are you going to go swimming in that water?
You bet. I'm going into the ocean.
I actually hate swimming in the ocean.
Why do you like the beach then?
I like people watching.
Do you like doing that at the pool?
Yes, but when I go to the pool, I actually swim.
So I guess you won't go surfing with me.
Nope, but I'll cheer for you from my beach towel.
I'd rather do something together like making a sand castle.
Thank you for coming to our travel agency. How can I help you?
I would like to book a trip to Disney World for my family.
Your family will have much fun. When do you want to go?
We want to go during the summer when the kids have off from school.
I suggest early June because it won't rain too much and the park isn't as crowded as later in the season.
Great! let's do the second week in June.
How many adults and how many children will be travelling?
There are two adults and two children.
Do you have an airline preference?
No. I have no preference as long as the flight is non-stop.
Do you want a budget hotel or a luxury hotel?
Can you book something in between?
Thank you for calling Eagle Airline.
I would like to book a round trip flight from Los Angeles to New York City
What date do you want to leave Los Angeles?
I want to leave on September 1st.
Do you prefer a morning flight?
Can you get me on a red-eye out of LAX?
I can book you on an overnight flight that will get you into New York City at 6 a.m.
Make sure I land in JFK not LaGuardia airport
Okay, so I have you on an overnight flight from Los Angeles International Airport leaving at 10 p.m. to JFK.
I don't want to have anyone climbing over me to use the bathroom while I sleep, so I want a window seat.
I will put you in window seat 13A.
Make sure that isn't an exit row because I don't want to have to help in an emergency.
Let's book a trip to Puerto Rico.
There are so many online services that let us book from our computer right here at home.
How will we know we're getting a good deal though?
If we use a site like Expedia or Priceline, we can find something within our budget.
Can we book both flights and hotels online?
Yes, and we can even rent a car as part of our package.
I just logged onto those websites, so now what?
Just put the dates you want to travel, where you're traveling from, and where you want to go.
Wow, there are even reviews from people who stayed at the hotels.
Yes. You can even see pictures of what the hotel rooms look like.
We don't get paper tickets though.
We can print out all the information after we book it online if you want.
I would like to buy a plane ticket to Boston, Massachusetts.
What date would you like to leave and where are you leaving from?
I would like to travel for the Labor Day holiday and I'm leaving from Burbank airport.
We don't have any direct flights from Burbank to Boston's Logan airport.
I don't want to have a long layover.
I can make a reservation for you for a flight that changes planes in Denver.
How long is the layover?
The layover is two hours.
That will give me enough time to grab a bite. Book it.
Do you have a frequent flyer number?
What is that?
If you fly with us enough, you get points to earn towards a free flight.
Good afternoon! This is the Beach Palace Hotel. How can I help you?
Do you have any rooms available for this weekend?
Yes. How many nights will you be staying?
My wife and I would like to stay for two nights.
Do you want a room with a view of the beach?
Is that more expensive?
The room without a view is 200 dollars a night.
How much is a room with a view?
A room with a view is $300 a night.
Is there a room with a partial view?
There is a room with an obstructed view.
I'll take it, but only if it's less than $300.
Good afternoon. I want to get a U.S. Passport.
Is this your first passport?
It is my first U.S. Passport.
Did you fill out the application form?
I downloaded the form at home and have it here.
Did you bring proof of U.S. citizenship?
What kind of proof do I need?
A birth certificate if you were born in the U.S. or naturalization papers.
I'm a new citizen so I have naturalization papers.
This is good because it also serves as your identification.
What else do I need to provide?
I just need $165 and two photographs.
Can you tell me what are the luggage limits for this domestic flight?
You are allowed one carry-on luggage and one personal item.
So I can bring this roll-away suitcase on the plane?
Yes. That will fit in the overhead bin so it won't cost you.
What is a personal item?
Anything that will fit under the seat in front of you is a personal item.
Can I bring my really big suitcase on the plane?
No. We will have to check that in for $35.
That's not included in the cost of the ticket?
No. The first checked bag is $35 and another will be an additional $25.
When I was younger, everything was included in the price of the ticket.
Times have changed.
You are allowed two carry-on items on this flight.
Can I bring on this suitcase?
It looks smaller than 45 inches, so it should fit in the overhead compartment.
I don't want to put my computer bag in the overhead though.
The laptop bag can go underneath the seat in front of you.
It's cold in Buffalo, so can I bring my coat?
Your coat doesn't count as a carry-on.
I have a separate bag with a tuna sandwich I just bought.
The bag of food doesn't count as a carry-on.
This pillow doesn't fit in my bag either and I need it for the flight.
You can bring a pillow or blanket, too.
I forgot my blanket at home.
Can you give me a ride to the airport tomorrow?
Depends on what time you need to be at the airport.
Well, my flight leaves at 10:30 in the morning.
Did you check in online already?
Yes, I checked in and I don't have any bags to check.
So we should leave by 9:00, so you can be there by 9:30.
It's an international flight.
Oh, so you need to be there two hours before your flight.
Can you get me to the airport by 8:30?
That's when I take the kids to school, so no.
So how am I going to get to the airport then?
Guess you'll have to pay for a cab.
I'll pick you up at the airport when you come back from your business trip.
I'm taking the red-eye, so I land early in the morning.
Tell me the airline and terminal number so I know where to get you.
I'm taking Jet Air so that's terminal 4.
Call me when you land.
My flight comes in at 6 a.m., so just wait for me then.
Cars aren't allowed to wait outside the terminal for more than a few minutes.
I don't want to have to wait at the curb for too long.
Well, I don't want to get a ticket.
Fine, I'll call you when I'm at the baggage claim.
Call me after you get your bags from the baggage claim.
Fine, but don't make me wait too long for you.
Do you have your customs form?
Yes, I filled it out on the plane.
I also need your passport.
I'm a U.S. citizen.
I still need to see your passport.
What other documents do you need?
Do you have anything to declare?
I bought some leather wallets in Morocco.
You're going to have to show them to me.
Are you going to take then away from me?
I'll only confiscate them if they are made of python skin.
They are just leather wallets.
Can I check in here at the curb?
Sure! Do you have any bags you need to check in?
I have one suitcase.
That will be $35.
Oh, but I paid online already.
Can I see your ID and I'll check for you.
Here is my driver's license.
Sorry about that. You did pay already.
I told you so.
Looks like you're leaving out of gate 12A, but check the screens inside.
Can my mom come with me to the gate?
Not unless she is flying with you.
Can I please have a rum and coke?
You are going to have to wait until we take off and are at a cruising altitude.
I hate flying though, and I really need something to take the edge off.
I'm sorry we don't serve anything until after take-off.
I can pay you in cash.
We don't take cash on the plane anymore.
So how can I pay?
When I come around after we take off, you can pay with a debit or credit card.
I only have cash.
See if someone will buy you a drink then.
Can I smoke a cigarette to relax in the meantime?
Smoking isn't allowed on flights.
Do you hate flying as much as I do?
Only when I have chatty seatmates.
You look like a business traveler, am I right?
I'm in sales, but please excuse me. I have a lot of work to do.
Is that computer connected to the airplane wi-fi network?
It is, so I can send work to my office even when travelling.
I hope they pay you really well.
That's really none of your business.
Do you have a company credit card?
I do because I travel so much.
Maybe you can buy me a drink since all I have is cash.
I can only pay for business expenses, not alcohol.
Can I get you something to eat or drink?
I'd like a coffee and a breakfast sandwich.
The coffee is complimentary, but the sandwich costs five dollars.
So much for a measly sandwich?!
Will that be all for you?
For now, but if I'm hungry or thirsty later, can I have something else?
As long as it's before we land.
What else can I have to eat or drink?
There is a menu in your seatback pocket.
How do I get your attention when I'm ready to order something else?
Just press the button above your head with the image of a person.
Can I have a copy of my receipt?
I missed my connecting flight to Washington D.C.
How did you miss your flight?
I was sitting in the airport bar and I lost track of time.
Well, that's not really our fault.
Fine, but what can you do for me?
I can put you on the stand-by list.
What does that mean?
It means that if there are empty seats on the next flight out, you can get on.
What if there are no seats?
You can buy another ticket.
I didn't even buy the first ticket.
I guess you have to buy a ticket.
I need to get into downtown as quickly as possible.
We have many ground transportation options.
I don't want to have to share a car with anyone.
Then a taxi would probably be the best option.
Where can I get a taxi?
There is a special taxi line right outside the revolving doors.
How much is that going to cost me?
The city taxis have a meter so you pay by the mile.
Does the fare include the tip?
No, How much you tip is up to you.
Does the taxi take credit cards?
No. Taxis here are cash only.

items.title: Arranging a Tour of the City

sentences.sentence: Where can I get a tour of the city?
We can arrange a tour for you right here at our concierge desk.
How much is the tour?
It depends on what kind of tour you want.
I hear you have a half-day bus tour.
We do, and it is $25 per person.
Can I get off the bus and explore on my own?
You can only do that if you take the all-day bus tour.
Is that more money?
It doubles the price.
That's highway robbery, but book me anyway.
That will be $50 then.
I want to make a complaint about the all-day bus tour I took yesterday.
I'm sorry you have a complaint.
I actually have a few complaints.
Please tell me what went wrong.
We were stuck in traffic for an hour.
Well, that's out of our control.
The bus had no air conditioning.
It was 60 degrees out yesterday though.
I want a full refund.
I can't give you a full refund since you enjoyed part of the tour.
How about a partial refund then?
I will give you a partial refund for the unsatisfactory tour.
What are some of the best things to see in this city?
If you want to go sightseeing, we have a tour that leaves from the hotel.
I'd rather explore the city on my own.
In that case I can give you a map that highlights some of the best things to see.
That sounds perfect.
The map also has coupons attached for some restaurants and shops near the landmarks.
I love a bargain.
You can walk around the city, but I'll also give you a subway map in case you want to take the train.
The subway looks scary in the movies and on TV.
It isn't scary at all.
Can I get a subway pass from you?
No, you'll have to buy that at the train station.
I'm sorry, but today's bus tour has been canceled because of the weather.
Now what am I supposed to do?
The hotel's concierge will be happy to find you tickets to a local theater production.
I'm not really a theater person.
How about we get you reservations to one of the city's finest restaurants?
That sounds good.
What kind of food do you like?
I love seafood, especially lobster.
I'll book you a table at the Lobster Shack restaurant then.
Will the hotel provide transportation?
We can get you a cab.
I'd prefer a limo.
I can't believe today is the last day of our vacation.
We should shop for some souvenirs to bring back home to our friends.
I'd much rather we spend another day seeing the sights.
We can sightsee and buy souvenirs along the way.
Why don't we just buy souvenirs at the airport?
The airport charges way too much for souvenirs.
Our friends won't know the difference.
We will know!
The hotel has postcards in the lobby, I think.
Postcards are to be mailed not given as souvenirs.
Fine! Let's go to the museum gift shop.
That's a great idea.
Officer, my wallet and passport are gone.
We'll file a report so that no one else tries to use your passport.
What about my credit cards?
You'll have to call the credit card companies and have them cancel the cards.
How will I get home without a passport?
You can't get home without a passport.
So what should I do?
Call the nearest U.S. Embassy and tell them what happened.
Will I need to apply for a new passport?
Most likely you will.
Is that going to take a long time?
Just take a copy of this police report and see if that will make the process faster.

items.title: Being Cautious in a Big City

sentences.sentence: You really shouldn't wear all that bling when we go sightseeing today.
Why are you such a scared cat?
You look like you want to be mugged.
Stop nagging me and walk with me to the ATM so I can get a lot of cash out.
You should only carry what you need for the day.
I don't want to have to make multiple trips to the ATM.
If you are robbed, they will take everything though.
Why are you so obsessed with crime?
It's just that criminals look for careless tourists.
You make it sound like every city is dangerous.
Cities have good and bad things.
Well, let's enjoy the good things and not expect the worse.
Come inside and meet my family.
How should I greet them?
They will probably want to hug you.
That's a little awkward.
It's just part of their culture.
Anything else I should prepare myself for before going in?
You should accept something to eat or drink even if you are not hungry or thirsty.
Is that part of the custom?
Yes. If you refuse, it is considered very rude.
I don't want to disrespect your family.
You'd better not disrespect them.
Don't worry, I'll do you a solid.
Where can I find the shuttle bus?
There're a number of shuttle buses you can take here at the airport.
I am looking for the shuttle bus that will take me to the rental car location.
Those are out the doors and to the left.
Are those shuttle buses free?
If you have a reservation with the car rental company, they are.
I forgot to make a reservation.
The rental car companies have kiosks at the other end of the airport.
Maybe I'll just take the shuttle bus to the subway.
That shuttle bus is free and is to the right when you exit.
Is there a shuttle bus to take me all the way home?
There is a company that offers that for a fee.
There really is no place like home even after a vacation.
Um honey, did you tell the neighbor to water the plants?
I thought you did.
What about the mail, did you tell the neighbor to pick that up?
So I have to do everything around here?
What about the cat?
What about the cat?
Did you get the neighbor to feed the cat while we were gone?
Cats are pretty good at taking care of themselves.
I can't believe you!
At least no one broke into the house while we were gone.
Thank goodness for the small miracle.
Can you help me find an apartment?
Sure, I would be happy to help.
I'm having trouble starting my search.
I would try driving around the neighborhood, and looking for any signs that
That's a good start. Thank you.
Don't mention it.
Do you have any other advice you can offer?
Yes. Try searching on the internet for apartments.
The internet? Are you sure?
The internet is a great place for people to sell and buy all sorts of things.
Even renting out apartments?
Yes, even that. Just be sure to always be safe in all transactions.
Thank you for your help.
You're welcome.
I'm looking for an apartment. Have you seen any apartments for rent?
No, I have not. I'll keep an eye out.
Thank you. That's very helpful of you.
You're welcome. What kind of an apartment are you looking for?
An apartment with one bedroom.
In what city?
In the city of Pasadena.
You should try looking in the local newspaper.
That's a good idea. I'll try that today.
Let me know if you find any apartments.
Alright, I'll keep you in the loop.
Good luck in your search.
I found an apartment!
That's great to hear. I congratulate you.
Thank you. I'm so glad I finally found one.
How did you find it?
On the computer.
How did you know to look there?
A friend told me to look online.
Where is the apartment?
In Pasadena.
That's a nice town. How big is the apartment?
It's big enough for me.
You should meet with a Rental Agent.
What for?
To get a professional opinion.
Good idea. Know of any?
You could talk to mine. Here's his business card.
Are you the Rental Agent?
Yes, I am. Welcome to my office.
It's nice to meet you. Thank you.
How did you hear about me?
A friend referred me to you.
Oh really. I'm glad.
He said you were the right person to talk to about renting an apartment.
That's nice to hear. I'm flattered. How can I help you?
I found an apartment in Pasadena, and I wanted a second opinion.
Sure. Do you have the apartment's information?
Yes, I do. Here it is.
Thank you.
Is it a good apartment?
Yes. It seems fine to me.
That's good to hear.
There is only one issue.
What is it?
The landlord is asking for too much money.
What should I do?
Negotiate with him.
I'm not such a good negotiator. Can you do it for me?
For a small fee, I sure can.
Alright, you have the deal.
I'll call him this evening.
Is the location of the apartment a good one?
Yes. I would say so.
Why is that?
The city of Pasadena is generally safe. Have you been there?
Yes, it's relatively calm.
Do have any other concerns about the location?
Is the apartment's location near any shopping areas?
Yes, it is.
What shopping areas?
There is a place called Old Town where a lot of shops are located.
How far away is Old Town from the apartment's location?
Ten minutes away on car.
And on foot?
